content.title: Launch the App
content.body:
1. On your Volt MX App, click Launch.
    You may see an Application Name input box. If there is an input box, enter RecipientsMobApp, and then click Launch.
  2. Click the Login button on the form to view the Accounts list.
    You do not need login credentials for this app. You will be adding authentication to the app in the next hike.
  3. Click Recipients.
    The Recipients list appears.
  4. To exit the app on your mobile device, swipe two fingers from left to right or shake your mobile device and click Exit App.
